item.title: 7 Stealth Games With The Best Melee Combat, Ranked
item.description:
Summary

  • Some stealth games offer thrilling melee combat experiences for gamers to enjoy.
  • Assassin's Creed Mirage adopts a divisive combat style inspired by Soulsborne games.
  • Hitman 3 showcases brutal, intense melee combat that is unforgiving and ruthless.

Fighting from the shadows is the stealth genre's bread and butter. If players are spotted in broad daylight, well—they done goofed. In some games, that’s an instant game over. In others, you can settle the issue with some good old-fashioned fisticuffs.

There’s something exhilarating about roughing up nosy enemies who manage to spot the player and then hightailing it away, leaving an impressive trail of incapacitated bodies behind. Unfortunately, some stealth games shy away from this scenario so hard that they turn combat into a tedious chore. But there are some exceptions to this, with certain stealth games allowing players to participate in some truly great melee combat scenarios whenever stealth doesn't seem to be doing the trick.

7 Manhunt

A Frightening Stealth Title That Incorporates PS2-Era GTA Fighting Mechanics

Ah, Manhunt . This game is relic from the edgy early 2000s that continues to bask in its infamy. This notorious title has developed a cult following since its 2003 release, often finding itself synonymous with video game controversy. Still, there's a dark and twisted satisfaction to playing a murderous death row inmate with a deranged Brian Cox speaking in players' ears.

The combat itself isn’t anything to write home to one's prison sweetheart about, borrowing heavily from Rockstar’s GTA PS2-era mechanics, but that doesn't stop it from being stupidly violent and, more importantly, stupidly fun.

6 Assassin's Creed Mirage

Features Back-To-Basics Melee Combat That Fans Of The Series Know And Love

Assassin's Creed is undoubtedly the most successful franchise in the stealth game genre, so it’s no surprise that it would earn a spot among stealth games that feature great melee combat . After a stint in the action RPG space, Ubisoft decided to reel it back in with Assassin's Creed Mirage , a love letter to the series’ stealth-heavy origins.

The game delivers more parkour, more bales of hay, and less open-world busy work. While this pleased some players, the combat didn't fully return to the classic formula. Instead, it drew inspiration from the Soulsborne series, leaning into quick Sekiro -esque reaction times and colorful visual cues signaling an impending bonk. The result of this is a divisive love-it-or-hate-it combat experience that keeps players on their toes.

5 Tom Clancy's Splinter Cell: Blacklist

Aggressive Stealth That Is Both Crunchy And Fluid

The last Splinter Cell game might not reach the heights of Chaos Theory , but it was a solid entry nonetheless for starved fans of the series. Building on the previous installment, Ubisoft Toronto stuck to the "aggressive stealth" approach while throwing old-school fans a bone with more traditional sneaking options.

Players once again step into the boots of Sam Fisher, the godfather of stealth. Levels, objectives, and blissfully unaware enemies can be approached however players see fit—whether that means running and gunning or hiding and biding. The fluid, crunchy melee combat was a highlight, and much of that can be credited to Kevin Secours, the game’s combat consultant and main stuntman.

4 Dishonored

Surprisingly Satisfying Swordplay For A First-Person Series

The Dishonored games reward players for staying unseen and avoiding conflict altogether, but there’s nothing stopping them from sprinting knife-first at an unsuspecting enemy. While pistols and crossbows are a tempting go-to during chaotic moments, the real satisfaction lies in the game's dynamic swordplay.

Surprisingly intricate for a first-person game, the melee system incorporates slides, slashes, stabs, blocks, and parries. Mastering timed sword blocks creates combat advantages by leaving enemies off-balance, allowing players to finish them off or (in Dishonored 2 ) punch them senseless in order to use them as a human shield or choke them unconscious.

3 Hitman 3

Offers Brilliantly Brutal Punches, Takedowns, And Executions

Hitman 3 easily claims the title of the most brutal stealth game with great melee combat . Anyone who lands in the crosshairs of Agent 47 is irredeemably screwed. While the gunplay itself is perfectly executed, going to town on an unsuspecting opponent with an axe is enough to make even seasoned players wince. The melee combat is downright ruthless — from bone-crunching body shots to blunt-force knockouts.

The third installment in the World of Assassination trilogy unapologetically puts the “hit” in Hitman . Beyond being one of the best stealth games of all time, it’s undeniable that the combat goes harder than anyone expected.

2 Batman: Arkham Knight

Allows Players To Take On Mobs Of Enemies With Glorious Free-Flowing Combat

The Batman: Arkham games revolutionized superhero gaming. They’re the reason reviewers love to use “It’s a game that makes you feel like [INSERT SUPERHERO HERE].” What often goes overlooked is that these games are, at their core, stealth-driven. Batman is, after all, a master of fighting from the shadows.

However, there are times when players are thrown into chaotic scenarios with a swarm of enemies eager to pummel a man dressed as a bat. To address this, Rocksteady Studios introduced the groundbreaking "Freeflow Combat" system. Whereas before, groups of enemies would politely wait their turn, they would now charge in all at once. This innovation allows Batman to ping from enemy to enemy like an enraged pinball with fists, making for a truly amusing combat approach.

1 Metal Gear Solid 5: The Phantom Pain

Implements Complex Fighting Mechanics That Deserve Their Own Game

Kojima really outdid himself with Metal Gear Solid 5: The Phantom Pain . He somehow made it more convoluted and goofier, which is precisely why it stands as one of the best PS4 games. But what truly elevates it is the return of the series' incredibly cool and in-world titled CQC (Close Quarters Combat). This melee system is so intricate and satisfying that it could've been its own game. Snake can perform combos, throw enemies to the ground, chain attacks for multiple targets, and expertly disarm opponents in what feels like milliseconds.

Behind the scenes, these advanced combat techniques were designed by the legendary military specialist Motosada Mori. Not only is he a member of the International Close Combat Instructors Association, but he was also the actual bodyguard of the Dalai Lama . Who wouldn’t want a game designed by that guy?

item.title: Roblox Party Codes (February 2025)
item.description:
Quick Links

  • All Roblox Party Codes
  • How to Redeem Roblox Party Codes
  • How to Get More Roblox Party Codes

Roblox Party offers players to play an exciting board party game. Depending on how you roll the dice, you can get coins, lose them, or start a mini-game. Each round leads to an unexpected but fun outcome. And by winning, players can earn valuable Gems. Fortunately, there is a way to get them faster, namely using Roblox Party codes.

These Roblox codes are a great source of free Gems. Just a few of them can give you more than 300 Gems. However, their activity period is limited, so you should redeem them as soon as possible.

Updated February 12, 2025, by Artur Novichenko: Although only 1 code is available for now, the situation can change at any time. With that in mind, be sure to redeem the current freebie and come back later.

All Roblox Party Codes

Working Roblox Party Codes

  • minigamemode - Redeem this code to get 75 Gems

Expired Roblox Party Codes

  • pumpking
  • graveyard
  • giganticdice
  • dailychallengez
  • september2024
  • deepseaexplorer
  • onefinalcode
  • tooinsane
  • tenmilclub
  • manyupdateslater
  • whysomanycodesman
  • anothercodeforu
  • atlantis
  • 3yearslater
  • mindblowing
  • robloxpartythebest
  • 10mil

Roblox Party gameplay is very diverse. Players can choose different portals that will lead them to different board games. And if you choose the quick join option, you will always spawn in random locations. So even playing with the same people, you will always get new content and activities. To make it even more diverse, you can spend Gems on various items.

Codes feature is available from the very beginning of the game, so players can get extra Gems pretty quickly. However, after a short time after the release, the codes expire. Often this happens with the release of new updates, so you shouldn't delay redeeming them.

How to Redeem Roblox Party Codes

As with other Roblox experiences, using Roblox Party codes is quite simple. Players only need to do a few clicks to do this. For convenience, you can follow these steps:

  • First, launch Roblox Party .
  • Then, open the Shop by clicking on the corresponding button on the right side of the screen.
  • After that, go to the Codes tab.
  • Enter the code and click the Redeem button to get free goodies.

How to Get More Roblox Party Codes

Some Roblox Party codes can be found right in the game. To do this, players must explore the lobby and check update notes. You should also visit the social media pages of the developers to get more Roblox codes:

  • White Hat Studios X page
  • White Hat Studios Discord server

item.title: Roblox: Spray Paint Codes (February 2025)
item.description:
Spray Paint is a tool that will help you draw ready-made stickers in different Roblox games. The tool is paid, but with it, you can use a huge array of stickers in many games. Below, we will share a list of all Spray Paint codes.

Updated February 12, 2025, by Artur Novichenko: With this guide you will have much more fun playing because it offers codes for different songs. Here you can choose a track for every taste, and we are constantly looking for new codes, so save this guide and come back later.

How to Enter Codes in Spray Paint

Redeeming codes in various Roblox games is usually easy, but Spray Paint is a tool; therefore, codes need to be entered slightly differently. The guide below will show you how to enter Spray Paint codes.

  • Buy Spray Paint .
  • Go to any game compatible with Spray Paint .
  • Equip Spray Paint .
  • Paste the code into the Decal ID box.

How to Get More Flame Of Spray Paint

New Spray Paint codes are occasionally available; to ensure you get them, bookmark this page in your browser. As with other Roblox codes articles, we update it regularly, so if new codes appear, you will find them here.

item.title: Roblox: Deep Descent Codes (February 2025)
item.description:
Quick Links

  • All Deep Descent Codes
  • How to Redeem Deep Descent Codes
  • How to Get More Deep Descent Codes

Since Deep Descent is a cooperative survival game, teamwork is the key to success. And so that you don’t get confused between your teammates, the game has many customization items. Therefore, in this guide, we will tell you how to get new equipment for your character using Deep Descent codes.

These Roblox codes reward players with various items. Among the rewards, you will find both Cash and Crates. The latter drop random equipment items, such as Helmets or Suits.

Updated February 12, 2025, by Artur Novichenko: This guide offers continuous access to new freebies. Although there are only 2 codes available now that you can redeem, new ones may appear with new updates, so be sure to save this guide and check back periodically for new rewards.

All Deep Descent Codes

Working Deep Descent Codes

  • 2025 - Redeem this code to get 500 Cash
  • CASH! - Redeem this code to get 500 Cash

Expired Deep Descent Codes

  • UPCOMING!
  • JULY4TH
  • 10M

Playing Deep Descent , you must descend into the mysterious depths to find the previous research vessel. However, in addition to the problems with the vessel due to the enormous depth, players will also have to face several entities. Each of them can easily kill you if you are not careful enough. But you will earn the Cash needed to buy Crates only by winning the runs. Fortunately, Deep Descent codes can help you with this.

This feature is available from the very beginning of the game. So even if you have just started your adventure, you can get extra rewards. Codes contain both currencies and Crates that will be useful for all players. However, it is important to note that their activity period is quite short. So, you should hurry to redeem them if you do not want to miss out on free goodies.

How to Redeem Deep Descent Codes

Using Deep Descent codes is even easier than in most Roblox experiences. Players only need to make a few clicks to get rewards. But if this is your first time trying it out, make sure that you follow these simple steps:

  • First, launch Deep Descent .
  • Then, find and click on the Codes button on the left side of the screen. It's easy to spot because it has a Twitter icon.
  • After that, enter the code and click the Redeem button to claim your reward.

How to Get More Deep Descent Codes

Like with most other Roblox games, the developers add new codes for Deep Descent often. But you shouldn't delay their use due to the short expiration date. So, players will want to visit the developers' official social media pages for all the news and codes first-hand.

  • Polar Marine Exploration Roblox group
  • Polar Marine Exploration Discord server

item.title: Whispers Codes (February 2025)
item.description:
Whispers is one of the representatives of interactive romance games with many different stories. Moreover, players have to make choices that affect the course of their adventure. But to enjoy the game to the fullest, you will need Diamonds. Fortunately, they can be obtained using Whispers codes.

Like most other mobile romance games, Whispers has a currency for which you can unlock new chapters. Usually, it is difficult to earn them, but codes will make your game much easier.

Updated February 12, 2025, by Artur Novichenko: As usual, 1 new code has replaced 1 old one, and you can redeem it to get 5 diamonds. You'd better save this guide so you never miss out on new rewards.

All Whispers Codes

Working Whispers Codes

  • ZxTp27 - Redeem this code to get 5 Diamonds (NEW)

Expired Whispers Codes

Whispers gameplay is similar to other games in the genre, as you just need to enjoy the story and make choices at key moments. However, to unlock most of the content, you will need a lot of Diamonds. They can be earned in a number of ways, but Whispers codes are the best way to get them.

These codes will not earn you many Diamonds separately. But using all the active ones will earn you quite a lot. For this reason, players should not delay redeeming codes.

How to Redeem Whispers Codes

As for using Whispers codes, this feature is simple. Just follow these steps, and you will claim all your free Diamonds:

  • Launch Whispers .
  • Then, in the main menu, select the Rewards option.
  • After that, go to the Events tab and scroll down until you see the Redemption Code section.
  • Finally, enter the code and tap the Exchange button to claim your well-deserved rewards.

How to Get More Whispers Codes

Just like most popular mobile games, the developers release new codes for Whispers quite often. But due to their short time of activity, you should use them almost immediately. So, to get codes first-hand, we recommend that you start following the official pages of the game.

  • Whispers X page
  • Whispers Facebook page
  • Whispers Instagram page

Whispers is available on mobile devices.
